title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Teacher Professional Development Framework for Inquiry-Based Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Explain and apply the seven core components of the ProDevInq framework.
Integrate Inquiry-Based Science Education (IBSE) instructional design principles (DPs) into actual lesson planning.
Improve IBSE implementation plans through peer assessment and feedback using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
